product_desc:
We are DoubleBlinded, Inc., a new company dedicated to quality, safe, scientific self experimentation and citizen-science. Our goal is to apply scientific method and industry best practices to self-monitoring and health logging. We view ourselves as a keystone to the Quantified Self movement and our long term goal is to improve quality of life using science.

We are organizing our first ever group double-blinded study, available beginning December 1st, 2015 and lasting 28 days. We send you a one month kit to trial L-Theanine. You will receive four pill organizers, one for each week of the month. Each week may be either placebo or 200mg of L-Theanine and you will not know which it is. At the end of each day you will fill out a short survey with a few questions evaluating the effects of the pills. At the end of the 28 days you will see your results - including charts comparing your evaluations of actual L-Theanine to placebo - along with the combined anonymized results of the group.
name: Double Blinded
